## Description {#details}

This represents a simple continuous liveness interval for a value.

The start point is inclusive, the end point exclusive. These intervals are rendered as &#91;start,end).

Definition at line 162 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liveinterval-h">LiveInterval.h</a>.
